{raw_arrays}

/* MESSAGE STRUCT DEFINITIONS */
{struct_defs}

/* BOARD-SPECIFIC CAN FUNCTIONALITY. */
void {prefix}_CAN_init() {{
    // Allocate array of structs that will be shared with can_api
    CAN_msg_array = malloc(sizeof(msg_info*) * {NUM_MSGS});
    CAN_info_len = {NUM_MSGS};

    // Add one struct per TX messsage
{can_arr}

    // Call can_api init
    CAN_init({mode});

    initTimer();
}}

{setters}
